name: Atlas Business Solutions
tag_list: business-software, human-resources-software, hr-software, appointment-scheduling-software, employee-scheduling-software, business-planning-software, small-business
overview:
Atlas Business Solutions, Inc. (ABS) is a developer of easy-to-learn, easy-to-use, and affordable business management software. Founded in 1991, ABS has been recognized as an industry leader and was named as one of Software Magazineâ€™s Top 500 Software Companies in 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, and again in 2010.

Their commitment to customers is reflected in the mission statement: To provide exceptional small business software, customer service and support that will enhance the productivity of our customers. Over 100,000 customers worldwide from small to large-sized organizations in a broad range of industries rely on our solutions.

ABS has developed strategic relationships with leading software companies, like IntuitÂ® and MicrosoftÂ®, allowing a greater number of customers to benefit from their software solutions. ABS solutions directly reduce costs, save time and streamline business processes for customers in the areas of human resources, employee scheduling, appointment scheduling, business planning, and financial forecasting. ABS software titles include: Client Appointment Manager, Customer Appointment ManagerÂ®, HR Document Maker, Patient Appointment Manager, ScheduleAnywhereÂ®, ScheduleBase, Staff FilesÂ®, Ultimate Business PlannerÂ®, Ultimate Financial ForecasterÂ®, and Visual Staff SchedulerÂ® Pro.
